name: dsnap
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### dsnap: A driver state snapshot utility


dsnap adds additional driver debugging capabilities into Linux device drivers. The utility takes snapshots of the driver state and allows users to retrieve these snapshots with a user-space tool. This capability gives users invaluable information about the internal state of the driver in the event that the driver crashes while in use, thereby providing a faster, simpler debugging process. This project is the work of Team 2.718, a capstone team at Portland State University.
